name: SpaceWorm
description:
SpaceWorm

SpaceWorm is a casual retro game where you eat stars, planets and kill space-bugs.

Bugs

Bugs are your enemies, you can add it through upgrades.

Energy

The energy allows you to run faster or attack enemies; when the energy is gone, your XP will be consumed.

Upgrades

On your journey through the universe, decide how you will progress with upgrades.


  • 1 - Add bugs to universe.
  • 2 - Add more planets and stars per spawn.
  • 3 - Reduce global respawn time.
  • 4 - Add more maximum energy to worm.
  • 5 - Add more energy regeneration to worm.
  • 6 - Recover 1 HP.
  • 7 - Increment length of worm attack.

Controls


  • Z - Attack
  • X - Run
  • UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT - Movement
